TextBody:
Team,

Per our call today we confirmed that the current version of Stealth application(s) running in the Environment:

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)                11.6.0.69  
Netwrix Access Information Center               11.6.0.12  
NEA Sensitive Data (SDD)                            11.6.0.11  
Netwrix Activity Monitor (NAM)                  7.0.3035   
StealthINTERCEPT Server (SI)                     7.3.9.11
StealthINTERCEPT Agents (SIa)                  7.3.9.120  / 150  Patched for the 172 push

We temp set the SDD OCR job to a depth of 4 being that the OCR option was not enabled. Kicked off the Scheduled task.

For this 90min Upgrade meeting, we will need to have a Full backup (internal procedures) & Admin access to of the Following
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA) formally StealthAUDIT (SA) Server and Related SQL DB
Netwrix Activity Monitor (NAM) formally Stealthbits Activity Monitor (SAM) Server


Scheduling Link
nwxcorp.my.salesforce-sites.com/cts?Id=1Zs.0KeHJUy24Mhxmg3uYSm5M8ceOmNND1qBRZudDRs-Z&MeetingID=dGkmxmNCgpbAIa1bwoVKs8ag6zsUiqkblz8VLs969q0-Z

Download and unblock
Then copy over to the Server.
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)    11.6+            https://netwrix.com/customerportal/download?pdi=218
NEA Access Information Center        11.6+            https://netwrix.com/customerportal/download?pdi=222
NEA Sensitive Data Discovery          11.6+            https://netwrix.com/customerportal/download?pdi=219
Netwrix Activity Monitor                  7.0+            https://netwrix.com/customerportal/download?pdi=223


Please join from your Workstations to avoid any UAC issues on the Server Stealthbits is running on:
***NOTE*** The invite may not set the meeting reminder please adjust within your calendar once the Time is agreed on.


Dusty Grayson
Sr. Support Engineer
Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
____________________ __________
Cybersecurity That Works for You.
6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100,Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com

*****Please note Support communication changes*****
Directly emailing Support Engineers is likely to result in oversight, as they do not handle cases through email correspondence.
It is recommended to use the Support Portal for appropriate communication channels. https://www.netwrix.com/sign_in.html?rf=my_tickets.html

Emailing into support@stealthbits.com has been disabled as well.
